mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 3476) for an order placed by Cedarwood Publishing Company for 11,000 two color 8 1/2 x 6" pads for Ronnie Self, Mary Claire Rhodes, Roger Sovine, Jan Crutchfield, Kent Westberry, Bill Denny, Dollie Denny, Benny Joy, John Denny, Curley Rhodes, and Jim Hayner. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
